entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 3:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
